member.summary: Converts the specified to a developer friendly .
member.param: The to convert.
The error code that uniquely identifies the type of failure. Default is "UnhandledException".
The message that explains the reason for the failure. Default is "An unhandled exception occurred.".
The optional link to a help page associated with this failure.
member.returns: An initialized with the provided arguments, and (if embedded) enriched with insights of the .
member.remarks: Any meta data embedded by will be extracted and added as evidence to the final result.
